wikidataquality-value: Name for value of the current statement
wikidataquality-status: Name for status of the cross-check
wikidataquality-constraint-instructions: Instructions for starting a check against the constraints.
wikidataquality-constraint-instructions-: Example, what to enter to get good results.
wikidataquality-constraint-form-id-place: Entity id placeholder for the input field.
wikidataquality-constraint-form-submit-l: Label of the button, that starts the check.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-invali: Error message that appears when the entered string is not a valid entity id.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-entity: Error message that appears when the entered entity does not exist.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-headli: Headline that appears above the results
wikidataquality-constraint-result-table-: Column that shows the result of the constraint check.
Column that displays a link to the claim, the used property and its value.
Column that gives information about which constraint was checked.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-link-t: Text for the link to a claim group on the entity page.
Text for the link to a constraint on the property page.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-violat: Status for constraints that are violated in any way.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-except: Status for constraints that are violated, but marked as an exception.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-compli: Status for constraints that are complied with.
wikidataquality-constraint-result-todo: Status for constraints which cannot yet be checked due to a missing implementation.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-instructions: Instructions for starting a cross-check against GND.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-instructions-: Example item for cross-checking. Q159099 is suitable.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-form-entityid: Entity id placeholder for the input field.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-form-submit-l: Label of the button, that starts the cross-check.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-headli: Headline that appears above the cross-check results.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-item-n: Error message that appears when the entered item does not exist.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-no-wd-: Message that appears when the referenced wikidata entity does not exist.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-no-ext: Message that appears when the external entity does not exist.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-mismat: Message that appears for statements, which could not be verified.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-result-succes: : Message that appears for statements, which could be verified.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-comparative-v: Name for value from the external source for the cross-check.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-external-sour: Name for external source the comparative data is from.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-overview-hea: Headline that appears above the overview of external databases.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-import-date: Name for import date from the external source.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-language: Name for language from the external source.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-source-urls: Name for source urls from the external source.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-size: Name for size from the external source.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-license: Name for license from the external source.
wikidataquality-externaldbs-no-databases: Message that appears when no external databases exist.
